cards.title: Unicorns and Rainbows Unite!
cards.centerfold: Congratulations on finally coming out! Just remember, it’s not just a phase—unless you’re talking about fashion choices. Now you can officially blame all your glittery shoes on your fabulous self!
cards.artistInspiration: urban neo-expressionist style with raw energy, layered text elements, and vibrant graffiti colors

cards.title: Embrace Your Truth
cards.centerfold: Your journey is a beautiful testament to courage and authenticity. Coming out is not just a moment; it’s a celebration of who you truly are. May you find love and acceptance, both from yourself and those around you, as you step into the light with pride.
cards.artistInspiration: bold pop art with thick outlines, dancing figures, and radiant rainbow patterns

cards.title: Be You, Shine Bright
cards.centerfold: Your truth is a gift to the world! Embrace who you are with pride and let your authentic self shine. Remember, you are loved just as you are, and the journey of self-acceptance is a beautiful one.
cards.artistInspiration: maximalist portrait style with ornate patterns, powerful poses, and rich textile backgrounds
